original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘Maybe one of you has a sheep that falls into a deep hole on our day of rest. What will you do? You will take hold of it and you will lift it out of the hole.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 너희 중에 어떤 사람이 양 한 마리가 있어 안식일에 구덩이에 빠졌으면 끌어내지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Maybe one of you has a sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 너희 중 한 사람에게 양이 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that falls into a deep hole
You will take hold of it
and you will lift it out of the hole
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그것을 구멍에서 끌어낼 것이다
